<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 35.45PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	As at December 31, 2015, the secured bank borrowings of the Group were pledged by the related aircraft
	and buildings with an aggregate carrying amount of RMB29,147 million (2014: RMB23,117 million) (Note 18).
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 37.1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -21.3PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 35.45PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	On March 18, 2013, the Company issued ten-year guaranteed bonds with a principal amount of RMB4.8
	billion, at an issue price equal to the face value of the bonds. The bonds bear interest at the rate of 5.05% per annum, which
	are payable annually. The principal of the bonds will mature and be repayable on March 18, 2023. CEA Holding has unconditionally
	and irrevocably guaranteed the due payment and performance of the above bonds (Note 47(d)).
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 53.45PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 53.45PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	On June 5, 2013, Eastern Air
	Overseas issued three-year guaranteed bonds with a principal amount of RMB2.2 billion, at an issue price equal to the face value
	of the bonds. The bonds bear interest at the rate of 3.875% per annum, which are payable semi-annually. The principal of the bonds
	will mature and become repayable on June 5, 2016. The Company has unconditionally and irrevocably guaranteed the due payment and
	performance of the above bonds.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 53.45PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 53.45PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	On March 6, 2014, Eastern Air
	Overseas issued three-year guaranteed bonds with a principal amount of RMB2.5 billion, at an issue price equal to the face value
	of the bonds. The bonds bear interest at the rate of 4.80% per annum, which are payable semi-annually. The principal of the bonds
	will mature and become repayable on March 13, 2017. The Company has unconditionally and irrevocably guaranteed the due payment
	and performance of the above bonds.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 53.45PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 53.45PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	On May 14, 2014, Eastern Air
	Overseas issued three-year guaranteed bonds with a principal amount of RMB0.8 billion, at an issue price equal to the face value
	of the bonds. The bonds bear interest at the rate of 4.80% per annum, which are payable semi-annually. The principal of the bonds
	will mature and become repayable on May 14, 2017. The Company has unconditionally and irrevocably guaranteed the due payment and
	performance of the above bonds.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 37.1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -21.3PT">
	&nbsp;

<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_108"></A>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; WIDTH: 92%; FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 38.5PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: BOTTOM">
<TD NOWRAP COLSPAN="3" STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">
	Interest rate and final maturities
</TD>
<TD NOWRAP STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; PADDING-BOTTOM: 1PT">

<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_110"></A>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 38.5PT">
	35
</TD>
<TD>
	PROVISION FOR RETURN CONDITION CHECKS FOR AIRCRAFT UNDER OPERATING LEASES

</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21.3PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	In respect of aircraft and engines under operating leases, the Group has obligations to fulfill
	certain return conditions under the leases. The balance as at December 31, 2015 and 2014 represented the provision for the estimated
	cost of these return condition checks which is made on a straight-line basis over the term of the leases.
</TD>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 7.05PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The group companies participate
	in defined contribution retirement schemes organized by municipal governments of various provinces in which the group companies
	operate. Substantially all of the Group&rsquo;s PRC employees are eligible to participate in this defined contribution retirement
	schemes. In addition, the group companies implemented an additional defined contribution retirement pension scheme for eligible
	employees in 2015. For the year ended December 31, 2015, the Group&rsquo;s pension costs charged to profit or loss amounted to
	RMB1,479 million (2014: RMB1,492 million; 2013:
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	RMB1,005
	million).
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 37.1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -21.3PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 38.7PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Medical insurance
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 37.1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -21.3PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 35.4PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21.3PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Majority of the Group&rsquo;s PRC employees participate in the medical insurance schemes organized
	by municipal governments. For the year ended December 31, 2015, the Group&rsquo;s medical insurance contributions charged to profit
	or loss amounted to RMB563 million (2014: RMB533 million; 2013: RMB478 million).
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 37.1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -21.3PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 38.7PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Post-retirement benefits
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 37.1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -21.3PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 56.7PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	In addition to the above schemes,
	the Group provides eligible retirees with other post-retirement benefits, including retirement subsidies, transportation allowance
	as well as other welfare. The expected cost of providing these post-retirement benefits is actuarially determined and recognized
	by using the projected unit credit method, which involves a number of assumptions and estimates, including inflation rate, discount
	rate and etc.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 37.1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -21.3PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 35.4PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21.3PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The plan is exposed to interest rate risk and the risk of changes in the life expectancy for pensioners.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 56.7PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -21.3PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 35.4PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21.3PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The most recent actuarial valuation of the post-retirement benefit obligations was carried out
	at December 31, 2015 with assistance from a third party consultant using the projected unit credit actuarial valuation method.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 56.7PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -21.3PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 10.5PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -10.5PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 56.7PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -21.25PT">
	A quantitative
	sensitivity analysis for significant assumptions at the end of the reporting period is shown below:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 56.7PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -21.25PT">

	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 14.45PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21.25PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The sensitivity analyses above have been determined based on a method that extrapolates the impact
	on net post-retirement benefit obligations as a result of reasonable changes in key assumptions occurring at the end of the reporting
	period.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 36.9PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -21PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 15.9PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">

<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Expected contributions to be made in the future years out of the post-retirement benefit obligations
	were as follows:
</TD>

	&nbsp;

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 56.7PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -21.25PT">
	The average duration of the post-retirement benefit obligations
	at the end of 2015 was 13 years (2014: 12 years).
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 15.8PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21.3PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Deferred tax assets and liabilities are offset when there is a legally enforceable right of offsetting
	and when the deferred income taxes relate to the same authority. The following amounts, determined after appropriate offsetting,
	are shown in the consolidated statement of financial position:
</TD>

<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 15.8PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21.3PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	In accordance with the PRC tax law, tax losses can be carried forward, for a period of five years,
	to offset against future taxable income. The Group&rsquo;s tax losses carried forward will expire between 2016 and 2020.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 37.1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -21.3PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 15.8PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21.3PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	As at December 31, 2015, management carried out an assessment to determine whether future taxable
	profits will be available to utilize the tax losses and deductible temporary differences. As there are still uncertainties around
	the Group&rsquo;s future operating results, such as future fuel prices and market competition, management assessed that there are
	significant uncertainties that future taxable profits will be available and the deferred tax assets arising from aforementioned
	tax losses and deductible temporary differences were not recognized.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 37.8PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -21.3PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 15.8PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21.3PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The maximum exposure to credit risk at the reporting date is the fair value of the derivative assets
	in the statement of financial position.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 37.1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -21.3PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 15.8PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21.3PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Notes:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36.4PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Interest rate swaps
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 37.1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -21.3PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 15.8PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21.3PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Group uses interest rate swaps to reduce the risk of changes in market interest rates (Note
	3). The interest rate swaps entered into by the Group for swapping floating interest rates, usually referenced to LIBOR, into fixed
	rates are accounted for as cash flow hedges. Other interest rate swaps are accounted for as fair value hedges. As at December 31,
	2015, the notional amount of the outstanding interest rate swap agreements was approximately USD1,466 million (2014: USD801 million).
	These agreements will expire between 2016 and 2025.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 37.1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -21.3PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

	Realized and unrealized gains and losses arising from the valuation of these interest rate swaps
	have been dealt with in the consolidated statement of profit or loss and other comprehensive income as follows:

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36.4PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Foreign exchange forward contracts
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 37.1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -21.3PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 15.8PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21.3PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The Group uses
	foreign exchange forward contracts to reduce the risk of changes in currency exchange rates in respect of ticket sales and
	expenses denominated in foreign currencies (Note 3). The Group&rsquo;s foreign exchange forward contracts for selling foreign
	currency (i.e.,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Japanese Yen) and purchasing
	US dollars at fixed exchange rates are accounted for as cash flow hedges. As at December 31, 2015, the notional amount of the
	outstanding currency forward contracts was approximately USD12 million (2014: USD39 million), which will expire in
	2017.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 37.1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -21.3PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 15.8PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21.3PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Realized and unrealized gains and losses arising from the valuation of these contracts have been
	dealt with in the consolidated statement of profit or loss and other comprehensive income as follows:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 38.5PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	39
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	DERIVATIVES FINANCIAL INSTRUMENTS (cont&rsquo;d)
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36.4PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Cross currency swap
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 37.1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -21.3PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 15.8PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21.3PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Group uses cross currency swap to reduce the risk of changes in currency exchange rates and
	market interest rates (Note 3). The cross currency swap entered into by the Group for swapping US dollars floating interest rates
	(LIBOR) into Euro floating interest rates (EURIBOR), is accounted for as a cash flow hedge. As at December 31, 2015, the notional
	amount of the outstanding cross currency swap agreement was approximately USD38 million (2014: Nil). The agreement will expire
	in 2025.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 37.1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -21.3PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 15.8PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21.3PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Unrealized gain and loss arising from the valuation of the contract has been dealt with in the
	consolidated statement of profit or loss and other comprehensive income as follows:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 37.1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -21.3PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>

	Notes:

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 37.1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -23.1PT">

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36.85PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	(a)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	Capital
	reserve
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 65.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -23.1PT">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 65.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	Capital
	reserve represents the difference between the fair value of the net assets injected and the nominal amount of the Company&rsquo;s
	share capital issued in respect of a group restructuring carried out in June 1996 for the purpose of the Company&rsquo;s listing.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 65.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36.85PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	(b)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	Reserve
	funds
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 65.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -23.1PT">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 65.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	&#9;According
	to the PRC Company Law,&nbsp;the Company is required to transfer a portion of the profits to the statutory reserve. The
	transfer to this reserve must be made before distribution of dividend to shareholders and when there are retained profits at
	the end of the financial year.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 65.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	47
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	RELATED PARTY TRANSACTIONS
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 37.1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -23.1PT">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 14PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 23.1PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	The Group
	is controlled by CEA Holding, which directly owns 38.61% of the Company&rsquo;s shares
	as at December 31, 2015 (2014: 40.03%). In addition, through CES Global Holdings (Hong
	Kong) Limited and CES Finance Holding Co., Ltd., two wholly-owned subsidiaries of CEA
	Holding, CEA Holding indirectly owns additional approximately 19.99% and 3.48% of the
	Company&rsquo;s shares respectively as at December 31, 2015 (2014: 20.72% and 3.61%).
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 14PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 23.1PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 13.3PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 23.1PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	The Company
	is a state-owned enterprise established in the PRC and is controlled by the PRC government,
	which also owns a significant portion of the productive assets in the PRC. In accordance
	with IAS 24 &quot;Related Party Disclosures&quot;, government-related entities and their
	subsidiaries, directly or indirectly controlled, jointly controlled or significantly
	influenced by the PRC government are defined as related parties of the Group. On that
	basis, related parties include CEA Holding and its subsidiaries (other than the Group),
	other government-related entities and their subsidiaries (&quot;Other State-owned Enterprises&quot;),
	other entities and corporations over which the Company is able to control or exercise
	significant influence and key management personnel of the Company as well as their close
	family members.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 60.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -23.1PT">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 37.1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	For
	the purpose of the related party transaction disclosures, the directors of the Company believe that meaningful information in
	respect of related party transactions has been adequately disclosed.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 37.1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">

	(cont&rsquo;d)
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 35.45PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 35.7PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 13.95PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	(i)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	The Group&rsquo;s pricing
	policies on products purchased from related parties are mutually agreed between contract parties.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 14.15PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</FONT>
</P>

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 35.7PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 13.95PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	(ii)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	The Group&rsquo;s pricing
	policies on services provided by related parties are mutually agreed between contract parties.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 35.7PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 35.7PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 13.95PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: BLACK">
	(iii)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: BLACK">
	The
	Group&rsquo;s pricing policies on services provided to related parties are mutually agreed between contract parties.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 35.7PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 35.7PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 13.95PT">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	(iv)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	The
	Group&rsquo;s pricing policies on related party interest rates are mutually agreed based
	on benchmark interest rates between contract parties.
<B>
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 35.7PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 13.95PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: BLACK">
	(v)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: BLACK">
	The
	Group&rsquo;s pricing policies on transfer of equity or disposal of investments are mutually agreed based on the valuation prices.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 14.15PT">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	*
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	These
	related party transactions also constitute connected transactions or continuing connected
	transactions as defined in Chapter 14A of the Listing Rules.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	Except
	for the amounts due to CEA Holding, which are reimbursement in nature, all other amounts due to related parties are trade in nature.
	All amounts due to related parties are interest-free and payable within normal credit terms given by trade creditors.
</FONT>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 35.45PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	Note:
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	In
	July 2014, Eastern Air Overseas signed a loan contract with Jetstar Hong Kong, an associate
	of the Company. According to the contract, Eastern Air Overseas offered a loan of USD60
	million at the market interest rate to Jetstar Hong Kong. The principal of the loan was
	repaid on April 30, 2015.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 38.5PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; COLOR: #231916">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; COLOR: #231916">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	In
	January 2016, the Group received the approval from China Securities Regulatory Commission regarding the non-public issuance of
	not more than 2,329,192,546 A Shares.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 38.5PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; COLOR: #231916">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; COLOR: #231916">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	On
	January 18, 2016, the Company issued short-term debentures with a principal of RMB2.5 billion and maturity of 90 days. The debentures
	bear interest at the rate of 2.5% per annum.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 38.5PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; COLOR: #231916">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; COLOR: #231916">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	On
	January 20, 2016, the Company issued short-term debentures with a principal of RMB2.0 billion and maturity of 90 days. The debentures
	bear interest at the rate of 2.5% per annum.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 38.5PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; COLOR: #231916">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; COLOR: #231916">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	On
	March 24, 2016, the Company issued short-term debentures with a principal of RMB3.0 billion and maturity of 270 days. The debentures
	bear interest at the rate of 2.4% per annum.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 37.1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; COLOR: #231916">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; COLOR: #231916">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	The
	Board of the Group also intends, for mid-2016, a cash dividend distribution of not less than 40% of the net profit of the Company
	for the year 2015 under domestic accounting principles.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 38.5PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; COLOR: #231916">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; COLOR: #231916">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; COLOR: #231916">
	On April 8, 2016, the Company issued short-term
	debentures with a principal of RMB 3.0 billion and maturity of 259 days. The debentures bear interest at the rate of 2.5 % per
	annum.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; COLOR: #231916">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; COLOR: #231916">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; COLOR: #231916">
	On April 13, 2016, the Company
	issued short-term debentures with a principal of RMB 3.0 billion and maturity of 90 days. The debentures bear interest at the rate
	of 2.35 % per annum.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; COLOR: #231916">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; COLOR: #231916">
	On April 14, 2016, the Company issued short-term
	debentures with a principal of RMB 3.0 billion and maturity of 180 days. The debentures bear interest at the rate of 2.55 % per
	annum.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; COLOR: #231916">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; COLOR: #231916">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; COLOR: #231916">
	On April 20, 2016, the Company
	issued short-term debentures with a principal of RMB 3.0 billion and maturity of 270 days. The debentures bear interest at the
	rate of 2.80 % per annum.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; COLOR: #231916">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; COLOR: #231916">

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; COLOR: #5490CC">

	SUPPLEMENTAL AGREEMENT NO. 1, entered into as of the 9th, day of July, 2015, by and between THE BOEING COMPANY, a Delaware corporation
	with its principal offices in Seattle, Washington (Boeing) and CHINA EASTERN AIRLINES CORPORATION LIMITED with its principal office
	in Shanghai, People's Republic of China (Customer),

	the mutual covenants herein contained, the parties agree to amend the Purchase Agreement as follows.

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; BACKGROUND-COLOR: TRANSPARENT">
<B>
	Purchase
	Agreement No. PA-4077
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 204PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; BACKGROUND-COLOR: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; BACKGROUND-COLOR: TRANSPARENT">
	between
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; BACKGROUND-COLOR: TRANSPARENT">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; BACKGROUND-COLOR: TRANSPARENT">
<B>
	The
	Boeing Company
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; BACKGROUND-COLOR: TRANSPARENT">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; BACKGROUND-COLOR: TRANSPARENT">
<B>
	and
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; BACKGROUND-COLOR: TRANSPARENT">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; BACKGROUND-COLOR: TRANSPARENT">
<B>
	China
	Eastern Airlines Corporation Limited
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; BACKGROUND-COLOR: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; BACKGROUND-COLOR: TRANSPARENT">
	This
	Purchase Agreement No. PA-4077 between The Boeing Company, a Delaware corporation, (
<B>
	Boeing
</B>
	) and China Eastern Airlines
	Corporation Limited, a People&rsquo;s Republic of China corporation, (
<B>
	Customer
</B>
	) with China Eastern Aviation Import and
	Export Trading Corp., Ltd. and Eastern Air Overseas (Hong Kong) Ltd. as consenting parties (Consenting Parties) relating to the
	purchase and sale of Model 737-800 aircraft together with all tables, exhibits, supplemental exhibits, letter agreements and other
	attachments thereto, if any, (
<B>
	Purchase Agreement
</B>
	) incorporates the terms and conditions (except as specifically set forth
	below) of the Aircraft General Terms Agreement dated March 7, 2001 between the parties, identified as AGTA/CEA (
<B>
	AGTA
</B>
	).
	Boeing and Consenting Parties consent and agree that Customer may utilize the AGTA for the Purchase Agreement, and Customer agrees
	to be bound by the terms and conditions of the AGTA. All capitalized terms used but not defined in this Purchase Agreement have
	the same meaning as in the AGTA.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; BACKGROUND-COLOR: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	1.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">
<U>
	Quantity,
	Model and Description
</U>
</FONT>
	.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; BACKGROUND-COLOR: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; BACKGROUND-COLOR: TRANSPARENT">
	The
	aircraft to be delivered to Customer will be designated as Model 737-800 aircraft (
<B>
	Aircraft
</B>
	). Boeing will manufacture and
	sell to Customer Aircraft conforming to the configuration described in Exhibit A in the quantities listed in Table 1 and Table
	2 (collectively,
<B>
	Tables
</B>
	) to the Purchase Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; BACKGROUND-COLOR: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	2.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">
<U>
	Delivery
	Schedule
</U>
</FONT>
	.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; BACKGROUND-COLOR: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; BACKGROUND-COLOR: TRANSPARENT">
	The
	scheduled months of delivery of the Aircraft are listed in the attached Tables. Exhibit B describes certain responsibilities for
	both Customer and Boeing in order to accomplish the delivery of the Aircraft.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; BACKGROUND-COLOR: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	3.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">
<U>
	Price
</U>
</FONT>
	.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 34PT; BACKGROUND-COLOR: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 34PT; BACKGROUND-COLOR: TRANSPARENT">
	3.1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">
<U>
	Aircraft
	Basic Price
</U>
</FONT>
	. The Aircraft Basic Price is listed in the Tables and is subject to escalation in accordance with the terms
	of this Purchase Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 34PT; BACKGROUND-COLOR: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 34PT; BACKGROUND-COLOR: TRANSPARENT">
	3.2&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">
<U>
	Advance
	Payment Base Prices
</U>
</FONT>
	. The Advance Payment Base Prices listed in the Tables were calculated utilizing the latest escalation
	factors available to Boeing on the date of this Purchase Agreement projected to the month of scheduled delivery.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; BACKGROUND-COLOR: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	4.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">
<U>
	Payment
</U>
</FONT>
	.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 34PT; BACKGROUND-COLOR: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 34PT; BACKGROUND-COLOR: TRANSPARENT">
	4.1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The
	standard advance payment schedule for the Model 737-800 aircraft requires Customer to make certain advance payments, expressed
	in a percentage of the Advance Payment Base Price of each Aircraft beginning with a payment of one percent (1%), on the effective
	date of the Purchase Agreement for the Aircraft.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; BACKGROUND-COLOR: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 23%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<B>
	CEA-PA-4077
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 54%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<B>
	SA-1
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 23%; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<B>
	PA Page 1
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<B>
	BOEING PROPRIETARY
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; BACKGROUND-COLOR: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 6 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">

	&nbsp;

</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage190"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; BACKGROUND-COLOR: TRANSPARENT">
	Additional
	advance payments for each Aircraft are due as specified in and on the first business day of the months listed in the attached Tables.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 35PT; BACKGROUND-COLOR: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 35PT; BACKGROUND-COLOR: TRANSPARENT">
	4.2&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Not
	Used.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 35PT; BACKGROUND-COLOR: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 35PT; BACKGROUND-COLOR: TRANSPARENT">
	4.3&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;For
	any Aircraft whose scheduled month of delivery is less than twenty-four (24) months from the date of this Purchase Agreement, the
	total amount of advance payments due for payment upon signing of this Purchase Agreement will include all advance payments which
	are past due in accordance with the standard advance payment schedule set forth in paragraph 4.2 above.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 35PT; BACKGROUND-COLOR: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 35PT; BACKGROUND-COLOR: TRANSPARENT">
	4.4&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Customer
	will pay the balance of the Aircraft Price of each Aircraft at delivery.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; BACKGROUND-COLOR: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	5.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">
<U>
	Additional
	Terms
</U>
</FONT>
	.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 35PT; BACKGROUND-COLOR: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 35PT; BACKGROUND-COLOR: TRANSPARENT">
	5.1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">
<U>
	Aircraft
	Information Table
</U>
</FONT>
	. The Tables consolidate information contained in Articles
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">
	1,2,3
</FONT>
	and 4 with respect to (i) quantity of Aircraft, (ii) applicable Detail Specification, (iii) month and year of scheduled deliveries,
	(iv) Aircraft Basic Price, (v) applicable escalation factors and (vi) Advance Payment Base Prices and advance payments and their
	schedules.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 35PT; BACKGROUND-COLOR: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 35PT; BACKGROUND-COLOR: TRANSPARENT">
	5.2&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">
<U>
	Escalation
	Adiustment/Airframe and Optional Features
</U>
</FONT>
	. Supplemental Exhibit AE1 contains the applicable airframe and optional features
	escalation formula.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 35PT; BACKGROUND-COLOR: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 35PT; BACKGROUND-COLOR: TRANSPARENT">
	5.3&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">
<U>
	Buyer
	Furnished Equipment Variables
</U>
</FONT>
	. Supplemental Exhibit BFE1 contains supplier selection dates, on dock dates and other
	variables applicable to the Aircraft.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 35PT; BACKGROUND-COLOR: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 35PT; BACKGROUND-COLOR: TRANSPARENT">
	5.4&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">
<U>
	Customer
	Support Variables
</U>
</FONT>
	. Information, training, services and other things furnished by Boeing in support of introduction
	of the Aircraft into Customer's fleet are described in Supplemental Exhibit CS1. The level of support to be provided under Supplemental
	Exhibit CS1 (
<B>
	Entitlements
</B>
	) assumes that at the time of delivery of Customer&rsquo;s first Aircraft under the Purchase Agreement,
	Customer has taken possession of a 737-800 aircraft whether such aircraft was purchased, leased or otherwise obtained by Customer
	from Boeing or another party. Under no circumstances under the Purchase Agreement or any other agreement will Boeing provide the
	Entitlements more than once to support Customer&rsquo;s operation of 737-800 aircraft.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 35PT; BACKGROUND-COLOR: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 35PT; BACKGROUND-COLOR: TRANSPARENT">
	5.5&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">
<U>
	Engine
	Escalation Variables
</U>
</FONT>
	. Supplemental Exhibit EE1 contains the applicable engine escalation formula, the engine warranty
	and the engine patent indemnity for the Aircraft describes the applicable engine escalation formula and contains the engine warranty
	and the engine patent indemnity for the Aircraft.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 35PT; BACKGROUND-COLOR: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 35PT; BACKGROUND-COLOR: TRANSPARENT">
	5.6&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">
<U>
	Service
	Life Policy Component Variables
</U>
</FONT>
	. Supplemental Exhibit SLP1 lists the SLP Components covered by the Service Life Policy
	for the Aircraft.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 35PT; BACKGROUND-COLOR: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 35PT; BACKGROUND-COLOR: TRANSPARENT">
	5.7&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">
<U>
	Public
	Announcement
</U>
</FONT>
	. Boeing reserves the right to make a public announcement regarding Customer's purchase of the Aircraft
	upon approval of Boeing's press release by Customer's public relations department or other authorized representative.
</P>

	5.8&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">
<U>
	Negotiated
	Agreement; Entire Agreement
</U>
	. This Purchase Agreement, including the provisions of Article 8.2 of the AGTA relating to insurance,
	and Article 11 of Part 2 of Exhibit C of the AGTA relating to
<U>
	DISCLAIMER AND RELEASE
</U>
	and
<U>
	EXCLUSION OF CONSEQUENTIAL AND
	OTHER DAMAGES
</U>
	, has been the subject of discussion and negotiation and is understood by the parties; the Aircraft Price and
	other agreements of the parties stated in this Purchase Agreement were arrived at in consideration of such provisions. This Purchase
	Agreement, including the AGTA, contains the entire agreement between the parties and supersedes all previous proposals, understandings,
	commitments or representations whatsoever, oral or written, and may be changed only in writing signed by authorized representatives
	of the parties.
</FONT>

<EFX_EXHIBIT_12>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_12"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
<B>
	Exhibit 12.1
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	CERTIFICATION
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	I, Ma Xulun, certify that:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	I have reviewed this annual
	report on Form 20-F of China Eastern Airlines Corporation Limited&nbsp;(the &ldquo;Company&rdquo;);
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	2.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Based on my knowledge, this
	report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements
	made, in light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading with respect to the period covered by
	this report;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	3.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Based on my knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information included in this report, fairly present in all material respects the financial condition, results of operations and cash flows of the Company as of, and for, the periods presented in this report;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	4.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The Company&rsquo;s other certifying officer and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e)) and internal control over financial reporting (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(f) and 15d-15(f)) for the Company&nbsp;and have:
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(a)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Designed such disclosure
	controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that
	material information relating to the Company, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those
	entities, particularly during the period in which this report is being prepared;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1IN">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(b)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Designed such internal control over financial reporting, or caused such internal control over financial reporting to be designed under our supervision, to provide reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the preparation of financial statements for external purposes in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1IN">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(c)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Evaluated the effectiveness of the Company&rsquo;s disclosure controls and procedures and presented in this report our conclusions about the effectiveness of the disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this report based on such evaluation; and
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1IN">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(d)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Disclosed in this report any change in the Company&rsquo;s internal control over financial reporting that occurred during the period covered by the annual report that has materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the Company&rsquo;s internal control over financial reporting; and
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	5.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The Company&rsquo;s other certifying officer and I have disclosed, based on our most recent evaluation of internal control over financial reporting, to the Company&rsquo;s auditors and the audit committee of the Company&rsquo;s board of directors (or persons performing the equivalent functions):
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1IN">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(a)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	All significant deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal control over financial reporting which are reasonably likely to adversely affect the Company&rsquo;s ability to record, process, summarize and report financial information; and
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1IN">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(b)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Any fraud, whether or not material, that involves management or other employees who have a significant role in the Company&rsquo;s internal control over financial reporting.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

	report on Form 20-F of China Eastern Airlines Corporation Limited&nbsp;(the &ldquo;Company&rdquo;);
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>

</FONT>

<TD>

</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>

</FONT>

</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">

</FONT>

</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

	&nbsp;
</P>

	controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that

</TABLE>

</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">

<EFX_EXHIBIT_13>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_13"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
<B>
	Exhibit 13.1
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	CERTIFICATION
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Pursuant to 18 U.S.C. &sect; 1350, as adopted
	pursuant to Section 906 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002, the undersigned, Ma Xulun, President of China Eastern Airlines Corporation
	Limited (the &ldquo;Company&rdquo;), hereby certifies, to the best of his knowledge, that the Company&rsquo;s annual report on
	Form 20-F for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2015 (the &ldquo;Report&rdquo;) (i) fully complies with the requirements of Section&nbsp;13(a)
	or 15(d), as applicable, of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, and (ii) the information contained in the Report fairly presents,
	in all material respects, the financial condition and results of operations of the Company.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
<B>
	Exhibit 13.2
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	CERTIFICATION
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Pursuant to 18 U.S.C. &sect; 1350, as adopted
	pursuant to Section 906 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002, the undersigned, Wu Yongliang, Chief Financial Officer of China Eastern
	Airlines Corporation Limited (the &ldquo;Company&rdquo;), hereby certifies, to the best of his knowledge, that the Company&rsquo;s
	annual report on Form 20-F for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2015 (the &ldquo;Report&rdquo;) (i) fully complies with the requirements
	of Section&nbsp;13(a) or 15(d), as applicable, of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, and (ii) the information contained in the
	Report fairly presents, in all material respects, the financial condition and results of operations of the Company.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
